text: many companies rely on Oracle real
application clusters or RAC for its
horizontal performance scaling high
availability and failover capabilities
RAC is a relational database management
system that can meet today is always
available data requirements but
supporting Oracle RAC in the cloud
requires shared block storage and
multicast network connectivity between
Oracle RAC nodes those requirements are
completely met with VMware cloud on AWS
powered by VMware cloud foundation this
service integrates familiar vmware
services it's also optimized to run on
dedicated elastic bare metal AWS
infrastructure with vmware nsx a network
virtualization platform you can
provision logical overlay networks for
connected workloads the result multicast
networking support that can span
multiple availability zones a necessary
requirement for Oracle RAC node
membership and that's just the beginning
VMware cloud on AWS also includes VMware
virtual storage area networking or V Sam
for providing shared block storage also
capable of spanning multiple
availability zones through fault domains
have a hybrid environment no problem
your on-premises workloads can
communicate seamlessly with RAC nodes on
your AWS vmware sdd CS and you can
manage both your cloud and on-premises
resources from a single VMware vCenter
console you're also set up to seamlessly
migrate any on-premises nodes to AWS as
your business requirements change to
manage your cloud-based oracle volumes
natively you can use Oracle's automatic
storage management or ASM to consume
multi writer enabled VMware virtual
disks just like on-premises and with
oracle data guard you can continue using
the same data protection high
availability and disaster recovery
solutions you are already familiar with
so why not combine the power of your
on-premises oracle RAC solution with the
flexibility of the cloud contact us
today to learn more about how you can
leverage the power of VMware cloud on
AWS for your Oracle RAC environment
